summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BLOCK L2 Lifecycle UI + Diagnostics functionality. All backend APIs and frontend features working excellently with full integration between BTC/SPX lifecycle management.
passed_tests: All 13 backend lifecycle API endpoints working perfectly (GET /api/lifecycle/state, GET /api/lifecycle/events, POST /api/lifecycle/actions/force-warmup, etc.)
Lifecycle Tab loads correctly at /admin/fractal?tab=lifecycle for both BTC and SPX terminals
BTC and SPX Terminal cards display with correct status badges (Simulation, Warmup, Applied, Revoked)
Combined Mode section shows correct blockers and readiness status
Event Timeline displays lifecycle events with proper filtering (All Events, BTC Only, SPX Only)
Action buttons fully functional: Start Warmup, Force Apply, Revoke, Reset buttons all working
Real-time status updates: BTC transitions Simulation→Warmup→Applied working correctly
Asset switching between BTC and SPX terminals works seamlessly
Warmup progress bars display correctly with percentage and days completed
Drift severity and live samples metrics display properly (0/30, OK status)
No error messages or console errors found
Frontend-backend integration seamless with proper API calls
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (13/13 APIs working), Frontend: 100% (all UI components and interactions working)
